extendedInfo.description: To access mobile banking you must be a Mountain West Bank Online Banking customer. To sign up for Online Banking and receive access to mobile banking using your mobile device, customers can enroll by visiting the banks website and using the APPLY NOW drop down.  Sign up for mobile banking through your new Online Banking account.  Click on the Options tab, click the mobile settings tab and activate mobile banking access.  Then, begin browsing on your phone using the app just installed.  Our mobile banking is a solution that enables bank customers to use their Android to initiate routine transactions and conduct research anytime, from anywhere.  Customers can view account balances and transaction history, view account alerts, initiate account transfers and pay bills. Mountain West Bank Mobile Banking supports all account types including checking, savings, money market, certificates of deposit, loans and line of credit.Mountain West Bank Mobile Banking is a FREE* service that allows you to access your account anytime, from anywhere, using your Android.*There is no fee from Mountain West Bank. Connectivity and usage rates may apply.  Contact your wireless service provider for more details.Mountain West Bank - Member FDIC

reviews.title: Can\'t even register

reviews.comment: Pretty simple. Could you put a longer transaction period? At least its secure:-)
reviews.author: Ben Roman

reviews.title: It\'s an ok app
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app at best! It freezes quite a bit and have to restart time after time! Some days are good most are stcuk at the login or shuts down after I do.  The other is it does not let you know if your in the negatives! It shows you still have money an0 shows no sigh of it going or being in the negatives! Probably so they can get the fees they charge for doing so. Also trying to check transaction restarts sometimes?   But its nice just wish it would show if and when you hit negative amounts!!!
reviews.author: Nate Jensen

reviews.title: Wish I could view transactions
reviews.comment: I have tried multiple times since this app was released in May to check my transactions but the feature never works.  It freezes up and I have to force close the app.  Fine for seeing what my balance and making transfers.
reviews.author: Erin Birkhimer
